title: Turning the Projector On
content:
## Quick Steps

1. Make sure the Status Panel shows **Connected**
2. Click the green **Power On** button
3. Wait for the projector to warm up (30-60 seconds)
4. The Status Panel will update to show **Power: Warming Up**, then **Power: On**

## What Happens

- The application sends a power-on command to the projector
- The projector lamp begins warming up
- Status updates automatically as the projector starts
- History Panel shows "Power On → Success ✓"

## Warm-Up Time

Most projectors take **30-60 seconds** to fully warm up. During this time:
- The Status Panel shows "Warming Up" with an animated indicator
- The projected image gradually gets brighter
- You cannot turn the projector off (must wait for warm-up to complete)

## Troubleshooting

**If the command fails:**
- Check that Status Panel shows "Connected"
- Verify the projector is plugged in and powered at the wall
- Check the History Panel for specific error messages
- See "Troubleshooting Connection Problems" for detailed help

> **Tip:** Don't click the Power On button multiple times! The command was received the first time. Be patient and wait for the status to update.

> **Best Practice:** Turn on the projector 5-10 minutes before your presentation to allow proper warm-up time.
